price: Waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka yi hijira, kuma suka yi jihãdi, a cikin hanyar Allah, da dũkiyõyinsu, da rãyukansu, sũ ne mafi girma ga daraja, a wurin Allah, kuma waɗannan sũ ne mãsu babban rabo.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū wahājarū wajāhadū fī sabīli al-lahi bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim aʿẓamu darajatan ʿinda al-lahi wa-ulāika humu al-fāizūna
